div.p: The heart of the system. Maintains state about UI pausing operation or the lid being open and pausing operation. Runs algorithms like board, cutter calibration in parallel. Communicates with vision part to find out length of object being cut.

div.p:
Controls non Lego hardware like the locking solenoid, and buttons.
Polls Arduino to find out if lid is closed. If lid open, immediately notifies speed controller to pause operation, as well as hardware manager.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 212px; height: 1px; padding-top: 465px; margin-left: 5px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p: Maintains state about each motor's position, speed, power, running time. Can be paused without clearing this state.
